short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the GitHub Pull Request, Commit, and Blob pages span the full width of the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the GitHub Pull Request, Commit, and Blob pages span the full width of your browser, rather than maxing out at the default ~900 pixels. This makes viewing code on GitHub much easier, as most developers have widescreen monitors. If the page fails to expand, simply refresh the page.
